title: Found Nansyl as ingredient in ayurvedic hair oils & serums. But What's nansyl ! Does anyone know more
body: I'm using a hair oil called Keshpallav from avimee brand. It's main ingredient is Nansyl. They say it powerful antioxidant, best for hair growth, secret of their powerful formulation. But what is it really, even google failed to give me information about it. If anyone could help please share your knowledge in ayurveda with meðŸ™ƒ

comments.author: iYourVaidya
comments.body: It's a synthetic substance/ product/ ingredient
